Text: Thanks for working to get it right! This one's really funny.

Looks great. The riffs aren't the best, but the transfer is quite good. Just make sure that you don't get addicted to re-processing and that you always do it losslessly before the final transfer.

Thanks for putting in the effort to do a full rip...it's really a great watch! Would be better with better commentary.....I hear that the Manos commentary was really, really good...so I'm pirately expecting a great transfer of that, too. At least somebody cares. It's a weird dynamic, I know. Thanks, really! You rock it.
